channel.title: How to set up srl, already includes the chars file too!
channel.description:
Ok here is how to get SRL (going to be alot of typing )
First you download it here:
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WGALM6PA]Click here for SRL![/url]
Now heres how you put it together:
[u][b]FIRST STEP: [IMG]http://i89.photobucket.com/albums/k218/wyn01/first-1.jpg[/img]
SECOND STEP: [IMG]http://i89.photobucket.com/albums/k218/wyn01/second.jpg[/img]
THIRD STEP:[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i89.photobucket.com/albums/k218/wyn01/third.jpg[/img]
If i missed anything please say
Thanks and i hope this helps!

item.title: How to set up srl, already includes the chars file too!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

[quote=“wyn10, post:9, topic:15519”][quote author=Weibs link=topic=23145.msg262714#msg262714 date=1158899617]
Ok.
[/quote]

is this tut still going to help people?[/quote]

Probably not, because the insructions are on the download page, and the only instructions given are download, extract to Scar root file, and if you want run the test script.

Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: How to set up srl, already includes the chars file too!
item.dc:creator: @wyn10 wyn10
item.description:
@wyn10 wrote:

Weibs:

This tut is for 3.3? You don’t need a tut for 3.3, all you need to do is extract it in the Scar root file, and you’re done. No need to move the plugins or anything.

yes the tut is for 3.3 cause it says in the tut and i wanting to make a tutioral is because i was very bored

Read full topic
